Board.author: Yves Combe (yves@ycombe.net)
Board.title: Wordnumber memory game
Board.description: Turn the cards over to match the number with the word matching it.
Board.manual: You can see some cards, but you can't see what's on the other side of them. Each card is hiding a number of number, or the word of the number.
